description: A heavy helmet that provides excellent protection from all sorts of damage.  It is labeled as the advanced combat helmet.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A lightweight black helmet that provides excellent protection from all sorts of damage.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A distinctive helmet worn by firefighters.  More than just a piece of firefighting equipment, it serves as a badge of honor and respect.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A hard plastic helmet that covers the head and ears.  Designed to protect against a baseball to the head.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A thick foam helmet.  Designed to protect against concussion.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A conical iron helm with additional protection for the neck, associated with the Mongol Empire.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A heavy plastic helmet normally worn by football players.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
An Imperial Roman helmet, with distinct projections protecting the sides of the head.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

The top part of an unusually large wolf skull equiped with leather straps to secure it on your head.  Every inch of it has been carved with a maze of fine intertwined symbols that make your eyes water.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
This goes inside a helmet to help keep your head warm in cold climates.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A heavy helmet that provides excellent protection from all sorts of damage.  It has a tail coming off the back that provides protection to your neck.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A helmet with covers for your head and chin, leaving space in-between for you to wear goggles.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

An early medieval helmet with a projection guarding the nose, to better protect the face without obstructing vision.  Proper viking gear, unlike the stereotypical horned helm.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A makeshift cowl with protection for the eyes from rain and sun, designed for long travels.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A sturdy protective cowl extending down to the neck, fitted with a respirator and eye protection.  For dangerous scavenging ventures.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A helmet made from scraps of metal secured by simple strings; the loose collection of plates provides decent but not the most convenient protection.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A small metal helmet that covers the head and protects against cuts and percussion.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A customized, heavily armored steel and Kevlar helmet, modified to provide maximum comfort and protection from harm.  All the added material has made it rather heavy.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A spiked helmet once worn by German military officers.  The spike is very sharp.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
An ancient Greek bronze helmet that provides excellent protection for the head, with slits for the eyes and mouth.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
